Package com.jdbwc.exceptions

Class Summary
MySQLError Note from the author: SQLError is a utility class that maps MySQL error codes to X/Open error codes as is required by the JDBC spec.

Note from Tim: Added Type safety elements on map objects and implentations.
Unused portions have been removed and exception class names have been editted to support the JDBWC Driver.
You should have received a copy of the original file with this Drivers source bundle.

PS: Many thanks to the mySql team for making the Connector-J sources available to developers.
Many more thanks to Mark Matthews for writting this class file.
MySQLErrorNumbers Constants representing MySQL error numbers returned by the server in error messages.
MySQLMessages  
PgSQLError Note from the author: SQLError is a utility class that maps MySQL error codes to X/Open error codes as is required by the JDBC spec.

Note from Tim: Modified for PostgreSQL and added Type safety elements on map objects and implentations.
Unused portions have been removed and exception class names have been editted to support the JDBWC Driver.
You should have received a copy of the original file with this Drivers source bundle.

PS: Many thanks to the mySql team for making the Connector-J sources available to developers.
Many more thanks to Mark Matthews for writting this class file.
PgSQLErrorNumbers Constants representing MySQL error numbers returned by the server in error messages.
PgSQLMessages  
SQLError
